com.rti.dds.topic.InstanceId_t

[User Data Type Support]

final int[] value
 An array of four integers that uniquely represents a remote com.rti.dds.infrastructure.Entity.

Detailed Description

The data structure by which RTI Data Distribution Service identifies keys in user data types.

RTI Data Distribution Service propagates and differentiates between instances of keyed types using com.rti.dds.topic.InstanceId_t . Before a sample of a keyed type can be written, its key must be translated into one of these.

Users who do not edit the code generated by NDDSGen do not need to deal with this type.

This type is structurally identical to the key type of the built-in topic types. A one-to-one mapping must exist from the key fields of a user data sample to the values of this type's fields.

See also:
builtin.BuiltinTopicKey_t
